title: Unflinching Rin-chan
detail_text: <:th_ch0202/>Haah~, what a problem….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>What happened, Kasumin!? If it’s something that Rin can help with, do tell nya!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Kasumin is…. So cute that it’s troubling….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Haah~ That’s true. It’s hard being cute huh~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Eh? Rin-chan, you think Kasumin is cute? I mean of course Kasumin is! Kasumin is just asking the obvious!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Definitely nya! Rin thinks Kasumin is really cute~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Ri-, Rin-chan….!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Aah---!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Waah! What is it!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>T-, this is bad nya…. If Kasumin is getting troubled from being cute, then that means Kayochin should also be troubled nya….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Eh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Rin has to go help Kayochin! Let’s go together, Kasumin! Hurry nya---!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Eh, wa-.... Isn’t Kasumin the cute one!? Wait--!! Tell me---!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
